hero.body: Your solution to IT & capstone projects. Bringing ideas to life with code. Got a project in mind? Let's make it happen. I offer services to students and professionals.

frontend.p1: For the frontend, I have a strong background in **React**, utilizing TypeScript to build dynamic and responsive user interfaces. I am proficient in **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and **JavaScript (ES6+)**, ensuring that the applications I develop are both visually appealing and functionally robust.
frontend.p2: Apart from React, I also use various libraries and frameworks such as **Framer Motion** for animations, **Redux** for state management, and **Axios** for handling HTTP requests. I am also familiar with responsive design principles and frameworks like **Bootstrap** and **Tailwind** CSS to ensure that applications work seamlessly across different devices.

backend.p1: On the backend, I have experience working with **Laravel**, **Django** and **Express.js** to create RESTful APIs and server-side applications. I am skilled in using databases such as **MongoDB** and **MySQL** for data storage and retrieval, and I am comfortable with writing complex queries and optimizing database performance. For lightweight capstones and prototypes, I use **SQLite** for rapid development.
backend.p2: I also have experience with authentication and authorization mechanisms, including **JWT** and **OAuth**, to ensure secure access to applications. Additionally, I am familiar with deploying applications on cloud platforms like **Hostinger** and **AWS**, as well as using version control systems like **Git** for collaborative development.

languages.p1: I am proficient in a variety of programming languages, including **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Java**. This allows me to adapt to different project requirements and collaborate effectively with other developers. Outside of web development, I have experience with **C++** and **C#** for software development. I also have a solid understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) principles and design patterns, which I apply to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
languages.p2: I am also proficient in **Lua** for **Roblox** game development, creating interactive and engaging gaming experiences. My versatility in programming languages enables me to tackle a wide range of projects, from web applications to game development.
languages.p3: I also have experience with scripting languages like **Bash** and **PowerShell** for automating tasks and managing server environments.

mapua.description: Participated in the Mapua MCL-ACM CodeX 2025 Programming Competition and secured first place.

petmedics.description: Developed a sample marketing website with admin panel, role-based access, and appointment scheduling system for a veterinary clinic using React, Laravel, and SQLite.

contact.body: You can contact me via E-mail, Facebook, or even by phone number. I usually respond within a day.
contact.body2: If you're a LOA student, feel free to reach out to me personally! I'm often found in the CCS Faculty Lounge (if I have no classes).

about.p1: Hi! I'm Kurt Metra. I'm an 18-year-old BSIT Student in my first year, focused on web development and design, with over five years of programming & techical experience. I often provide assistance to students, especially 4th-years, for their needs and capstone projects.
about.p2: I've been engaged in web development for very well over a year. I create full-stack websites with a focus on minimalism and user experience. My goal is to deliver high-quality, efficient, and visually appealing web solutions that meet the needs of my clients. Aside from web development, I also have a strong background in Roblox game development, and most especially the programming language **Lua**, which I have been using for over five years. I've used it to script Roblox games, and even create mods for older games such as **PAYDAY 2**.
about.p3: I first started out with the programming language Lua in 2020, with Roblox game development - but eventually I branched out into other areas of development. I started learning Discord bot development using **JavaScript**, and later on explored **Java**, which I used to create Minecraft plugins in 2021.
about.p4: Over time, I expanded my skill set to include web development technologies such as **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**. I later learned popular frameworks and libraries such as **React** and **Node.js**, which enabled me to build dynamic responsive web applications. My journey in programming has been driven by a passion for creating innovative solutions and a commitment to continuous learning and improvement.
about.p5: Today, I specialize in full-stack web development, leveraging my diverse programming background to deliver comprehensive solutions that meet the unique needs of my clients. Despite being a 1st-year student, I believe in my ability to be able to deliver quality projects that exceed expectations.
about.p6: Looking ahead, I am eager to further enhance my skills in web development and explore new technologies and frameworks. I aim to take on more complex projects that challenge my abilities and allow me to grow as a developer. Additionally, I plan to expand my knowledge in related areas such as mobile app development and cloud computing, with the goal of becoming a versatile and well-rounded full-stack developer.
about.p7: This 5-year journey with programming has been incredibly rewarding, and I am excited about the opportunities that lie ahead as I continue my passions and interests - it doesn't just end here.

timeline.1: Began programming with Lua, focusing on Roblox game development and scripting.
timeline.2: Learned JavaScript and started developing custom Discord bots for server management and engagement.
timeline.3: Explored Java programming to create custom Minecraft plugins, enhancing gameplay experiences.
timeline.4: Started learning Blender for 3D modeling and design, expanding creative skills beyond programming.
timeline.5: Attended my first ever competition, and ended up surprisingly securing first place!
timeline.6: Dove into web development, mastering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React and Django to build dynamic web applications.
timeline.7: Came back even stronger, and secured first place this time around!
timeline.8: Continuing to expand my skill set in web development, application development, and other programming areas to stay current with industry trends.
